summary: Completed comprehensive testing of themes and arrows functionality. Successfully verified theme changes to Emerald Green, arrow color customization to blue, and conditional arrow visibility logic (visible on Hero/Body slides, hidden on CTA slides).
passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate)
Dashboard loads successfully with existing projects
Editor opens and loads correctly with Design tab functionality
Theme change from Electric Lime to Emerald Green works correctly
Primary color updates on slide when theme is changed (emerald/teal color visible)
Arrow color customization to blue (#0000FF) works correctly
Arrow is visible on Hero slide type with correct blue color
Arrow is visible on Body slide type with correct blue color
Arrow is correctly NOT visible on CTA slide type
Slide type switching between Hero, Body, and CTA works correctly
Real-time slide canvas updates when design changes are made
Screenshot capture functionality works for all slide types
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (12/12 features tested successfully)
